title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When selecting a Project, right-clicking and selecting Properties, then navigating to the subsequent Info page, the fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as text fields.
EB: When selecting a Project, right-clicking and selecting Properties, then navigating to the subsequent Info page, the fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) should not be displayed as text fields.
SR: The fields in the subsequent Info page when viewing project properties should be displayed as readonly fields instead of text fields.
